posts.post_content:
Hey all,

I'm looking to rekindle my love for the T205 and T206 sets.  Currently I only own 5 T205s and a single T206, so I need just about anything.  I would love to grab a large lot (since I've been unsuccessful at grabbing Steve's awesome offers right now) of either gradable raw cards or SGC slabbed.  I'm not completely against PSA, but I certainly would love to have SGC over it.  

I'm also game for obtaining single cards as well.  I don't have a ton to trade, so I will probably need to buy....although let me know what you collect.

Thanks so much!!

Jimi

PS.  Please e-mail me at [url]jimivintage@yahoo.com[/url]

it's great news to hear that you're back after the monster again.
i have a shaw from providence that has a bit of a rough back but it's a dup
and i'll send it to you for free---just to celebrate the first steps toward the slaying!!!
just send me your address via email.
all the best,
barry
Too kind as always, Barry.  E-mail sent.  :)

it's in the mail tomorrow, ole buddy.
the Monster is already angry and seething.
you will tame him.

all the best,
barry

welcome back jimi,
i have a few t205's 4's and 5's. psa though. [url]marcusteward7@aol.com[/url]
lmk,
larry
